alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Oglala Lakota, southwestern Jackson and Bennett Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles north of Manderson to 3 miles southwest of Batesland to 5 miles west of Merriman. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sharps Corner, Thunder Valley, Swett and Lacreek Wildlife Refuge around 455 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Martin, Kyle, Allen, Sunrise Housing, Kyle North Route Housing, LaCreek North Housing, Yellow Bear Canyon, Tuthill, Snake Butte, Hisle and Vetal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
